plot outline: The story line traces the trail of events happening in the lives of three main characters in the movie. Haripada is an artist who performs at weddings. His soaring aspirations keep him wanting more and gives him a push to take his talent to the top. Sweety on the other hand is a successful actress. Haripada has always held a soft corner in his heart for her. One evening, Haripada gets in to an awkward situation where he bumps in to Sweety and Don Nandlal. From then on the events that unfold only complicate their situation further taking you on a roller-coaster ride of entertainment and laughter.
title: Haripada Bandwala
